Package sharedRegions

Class PlayGround

  • java.lang.Object
    • sharedRegions.PlayGround
  • public class PlayGround
extends java.lang.Object
    PlayGround. It is responsible for the synchronization of the coaches, contestants and referee during the trial and it is implemented as an implicit monitor. There are six synchronization points: two blocking points for the referee, where he waits for the last coach to inform him that the teams are ready before starting a new trial and waits for the trial to end (all players have pulled the rope); two blocking points for the coaches, where they wait for all the players to be ready and wait for the referee to assert the trial decision; and two blocking points for the contestants, where they wait for the referee to start the trial and wait for the referee to assert the trial decision.

      • getReady

        public void getReady()
        Operation getReady. It is called by the contestants to get ready to play and notify the coaches that they are ready.

      • informReferee

        public void informReferee()
        Operation informReferee. It is called by the coaches to inform the referee that the teams are ready to proceed.

        public void startTrial()
        Operation startTrial. It is called by the referee to start the trial.

        public void amDone()
        Operation amDone. It is called by the contestants to signal that they have finished playing.

        public int assertTrialDecision()
        Operation assertTrialDecision. It is called by the referee to assert the trial decision.
        Returns:
        position of the rope

      • reviewNotes

        public void reviewNotes()
        Operation reviewNotes. It is called by the coaches to review the notes of the contestants and redo the contestant strength queue.
